title: please do something about the trolls in weekly game mode
body:
i just want to fucking play these fucking games and i fucking get trolls all fucking game and when i fucking ask them not to troll they say "it's just aram bro"


i dont fucking care waht it is, if you're not trying to win you need to be fucking banned

replies.body: chill, it's just a game
thats stupid,  why is int allowed
who said it's allowed?
your comment

you're literally in here defending intentional feeders
how did you draw THIS conclusion?
"chill"

yes, you should chill.  you seems to be very upset.  not good for your health or the health of your lol acct.

this is a discussion board, not a war.  you act like if im not with you, then i am with "them".

you are with "them" by not being against intentional feeding in urf

and how do you still draw this conclusion?

go home. you're drunk.

and chill

because there is no middleground


i will not chill

i dont care if i have to go through millions of accounts, i will NEVER fucking chill when it comes to pieces of shit ruining my fucking games and wasting my fucking time

then less talking and more action-ing

{{sticker:sg-miss-fortune}}
Netflix and chill

I believe you can use the report functions that are in place for any other game mode in the Featured Game Modes. I'm not sure there's a way to reliably stop trolling before or as it happens, but you can use the tools we have a community to try to cut down on it generally.

my issue is that reports NEVER work for anything other than people using words that other people dont like

it's silly and ineffective
relax dude.  try to realize to a lot of people it really is just a video game to be played for fun

why is it okay?

can i take this same mentality into ranked and get away with it then? if so that's what im going to do because i wait an entire fucking year 
THREE HUNDRED AND SIXTY FUCKING FIVE DAYS


just to have my fucking games stolen from me by people who think its okay to INT


this is why league is dying

they care more about fucking words than people actually ruining the fucking game for others

its ok because its a video game and it is meant to be played for fun.  

maybe in ranked you can expect people to be giving 100% all the time - **maybe**.  but in normals?  thats crazy talk.

this tryharding all the time no matter what game mode is a sickness.  i cant believe how many people have that mindset these days.  people like you demanding 100% effort and excellence from everyone on their team like its the world championships every game.  but its an **aram**.  wtf?  

and it makes absolutely no sense.  do you know how matchmaking works?  no matter how hard you try you are only going to win half of your games.  that is a fact of matchmaking.  so what is the point in stressing and raging about it?  those kids you say were trolling in your aram are going to win 50% of their games.  just the same as you and everyone else.

Not everyone takes the game as seriously as you do fam, some people realize... its just a game.

Take the super tryhard omg stuff to ranked if you want to win that badly

no, i wait all fucking year for urf and i get nothing but fucking inting teammates and if i say fucking ANYTHING i risk a fucking ban

this is fucking bullshit
You didn't have to wait all year. It has come up a few times in the RGM
Just because someone dies a lot in chaotic game mode, always looking to fight, doesnt mean he is intentionally feeding.

Are you one of those people who yell "iiiiiiinnntt" after every death? Yesterday in an urf game I died twice in the first two minutes, but that does not mean I was inting. It's urf ffs, damage is all over the place

int has very little to do with dying and more to do with decisions


split pushing as brand while 5 people in our base for example
dude grow up it's just an ARAM game, it's not your ranked promos or anything
